languages.text:
Каждый бой в игре проходит на клеточном поле в пошаговом режиме. В свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонаж может двигаться, атаковать и использовать свои {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.
Выберите клетку внутри выделенной области и дважды нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы переместить туда персонажа.

traits.locale_text:
Каждый бой в игре проходит на клеточном поле в пошаговом режиме. В свой ход персонаж может двигаться, атаковать и использовать свои способности.
Выберите клетку внутри выделенной области и дважды нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы переместить туда персонажа.

languages.text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.
languages.original_text:
Каждый бой в игре проходит на клеточном поле в пошаговом режиме. В свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонаж может двигаться, атаковать и использовать свои {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.
Выберите клетку внутри выделенной области и дважды нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы переместить туда персонажа.

traits.locale_text:
All battles in the game are turn-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their abilities.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

All battles in the game are turn-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their abilities.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

languages.text:
Todas las batallas del juego se realizan por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} y tienen lugar en una cuadrícula. Durante su turno, el personaje puede moverse, atacar y usar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
Elige una casilla dentro de la zona destacada y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} dos veces para mover al personaje ahí mismo.
languages.original_text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

traits.locale_text:
Todas las batallas del juego se realizan por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} y tienen lugar en una cuadrícula. Durante su turno, el personaje puede moverse, atacar y usar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
Elige una casilla dentro de la zona destacada y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} dos veces para mover al personaje ahí mismo.

languages.text:
ゲームの戦闘はすべて{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}制で、グリッド上で行われる。ターン中、キャラクターは移動、攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できる。
ハイライト表示されたエリア内のセルを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を2回押すとキャラクターが移動する。
languages.original_text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

traits.locale_text:
ゲームの戦闘はすべて{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}制で、グリッド上で行われる。ターン中、キャラクターは移動、攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できる。
ハイライト表示されたエリア内のセルを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}を2回押すとキャラクターが移動する。

languages.text:
游戏中的所有战斗都是{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}制战斗，在战场网格上进行。在角色的回合中，角色可以移动、攻击、使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
在高亮区域选择任意格子，再按两次{console_bind|Confirm}，便可将角色移动到选定区域。
languages.original_text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

traits.locale_text:
游戏中的所有战斗都是{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}制战斗，在战场网格上进行。在角色的回合中，角色可以移动、攻击、使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
在高亮区域选择任意格子，再按两次{console_bind|Confirm}，便可将角色移动到选定区域。

languages.text:
Alle Kämpfe im Spiel sind {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}rundenbasiert{/g} und finden auf einem Raster statt. In seiner Runde kann ein Charakter sich bewegen, angreifen und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} einsetzen.
Wähle ein Feld innerhalb des markierten Bereichs und drücke zweimal {console_bind|Confirm}, um den Charakter dorthin zu bewegen.
languages.original_text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

traits.locale_text:
Alle Kämpfe im Spiel sind {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}rundenbasiert{/g} und finden auf einem Raster statt. In seiner Runde kann ein Charakter sich bewegen, angreifen und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} einsetzen.
Wähle ein Feld innerhalb des markierten Bereichs und drücke zweimal {console_bind|Confirm}, um den Charakter dorthin zu bewegen.

languages.text:
Tous les combats se déroulent au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} par tour sur une grille. Lors de son tour, un personnage peut se déplacer, attaquer et utiliser ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.
Sélectionnez une case dans la zone mise en évidence et appuyez deux fois sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour y déplacer le personnage.
languages.original_text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.

traits.locale_text:
Tous les combats se déroulent au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} par tour sur une grille. Lors de son tour, un personnage peut se déplacer, attaquer et utiliser ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.
Sélectionnez une cellule dans la zone en surbrillance et appuyez deux fois sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour y déplacer le personnage.

languages.text:
Oyundaki tüm çatışmalar {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} tabanlıdır ve hücrelere bölünmüş bir alanda gerçekleşir. Karakter, turu sırasında hareket edebilir, saldırabilir ve {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} kullanabilir.
Yeşil renkle gösterilen hücrelerden birini seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine çift basarak karakterini oraya ilerlet.
languages.original_text:
All battles in the game are {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}-based and take place on a grid. On their turn, a character can move, attack, and use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
Select a cell within the highlighted area and press {console_bind|Confirm} twice to move the character there.
